Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

New in 1.2.0Â¶

  • Added support for Hadoop 2.7.2.
  • Dropped support for Python 2.6. Maintaining 2.6 compatibility would require adding another dimension to the Travis matrix, vastly increasing the build time and ultimately slowing down the development. Since the default Python version in all major distributions is 2.7, the added effort would gain us little.
  • Bug fixes.
